short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your text for any spelling and/or grammatical errors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The GrammarBot Browser extension provides spelling and grammar checking capabilities to your daily grammatical needs. Submit text and receive a comprehensive report on potential errors and suggested corrections.
